title: The Case Against Adnan Syed
creator_credit: Amy J. Berg, HBO, HBO Documentary Films, Working Title Television and Instinct Productions
brief_description: Explore the 1999 disappearance and murder of 18-year-old Baltimore County high school student Hae Min Lee, and the subsequent conviction of her ex-boyfriend, Adnan Syed, a case brought to global attention by the hugely popular Serial podcast.

constellations_other.name: Reasonable doubt
constellations_other.description: Factual media has the power to reframe information and put forth new, persuasive arguments.  For the criminal justice system, where convictions are made based on arguments being convincing beyond a reasonable doubt, True Crime media has the ability to create doubt, right the wrongs of the justice system, and shed new light on closed cases.

creator_credit_for_label: Amy J. Berg, HBO, HBO Documentary Films, Working Title Television and Instinct Productions
